name: Disco Mayhem
description:
Controls:

-Arrows to move

-C to make a quick attack that moves the ball to the direction you're facing

-X to make a charged, precise attack that lets you control the direction the ball will go to!

Break walls on the dance floor with a dangerous flying blade!

Use C and X to slash the air and kick the blade into the walls. But be cautious because the blade also hurts you.

Try to clear the dancing floor before the blade gets too fast and goes out of control!
